title: Day 4 - Learned about animations, chess, Bootstrap and insurance
content:
• I made another animation today. It consists of a ball sliding in a circular slide and then hitting the cubes. I also added sound effects in it and now I have a much better understanding of sounds in animation.
  • Today I took a break from reading theory and applied it in my games. I played around 15 games today which consists of rapid, blitz, and bullet games. There was not much success in rapid and blitz but I won many bullet games today.
  • In Bootstrap, I learned about grids, forms, and placeholders. I made a home page for a blog website today. It is a smooth learning experience with CodeWithHarry.
  • Today I also started watching the Understanding Insurance series on the YouTube channel of Ankur Warikoo. I learned about different types of insurance and how and when to take insurance. I also learned bout how an insurance company works and what is their business model.
author: Aarush Popli
